emails.subject: Q3 Company Announcement
emails.body: Dear Team, I am excited to announce our Q3 initiative focused on sustainability and innovation. Over the next three months, we will be launching green product lines and upgrading our facilities to be carbon-neutral. Please join the kickoff meeting on May 1st. Details below.

emails.subject: Re: Q3 Company Announcement
emails.body: A reminder: the kickoff meeting is scheduled for May 1st at 10 AM in the main auditorium. Please RSVP by April 28th.

emails.subject: Re: Q3 Company Announcement
emails.body: RSVP submitted. Looking forward to learning more about the sustainability goals.

emails.subject: Re: Q3 Company Announcement
emails.body: Thank you for confirming. See you at the meeting.
